entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 27 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Blowing snow at times. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 27 by morning. Wind chill minus 49 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:33 PM MST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Near blizzard. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Near blizzard developing in the morning. Blowing snow at times early in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 25. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:33 PM MST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow in the evening. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 29. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:33 PM MST Thursday 19 January 2023
